data.name: Mistmoon Falls
data.detailed_description:
Mistmoon Falls is a detective game set in a rustic island town where peace and contentment reign, and everyone sorts their recycling. Or, at least, it might look that way, if you ignore the freshly murdered farmer.

But as the agent sent to investigate, you mustn’t ignore the murdered farmer. Instead, you must find clues, question the townsfolk, and gather enough evidence to make an arrest. In the meantime, you'll discover Mistmoon Falls harbors more than its fair share of secrets, not to mention denizens more sinister than the Tourist Board has been letting on…

Work the case however you see fit (this is both a feature and an imperative, detective, 'cuz there's no hand-holding)—just make sure you find out...

Features

  • An open world town, reminiscent of your favorite farm-life sim
  • Hidden clues and secrets abound—use your tools and your wits to uncover them
  • Choose your approach—how you talk, how you act, and who you trust will all have an impact
  • An array of crime-solving tools, including CSI spray, audio bugs, and a metal-detector
  • Who to arrest is up to you, but you'll have to make your case using the evidence you find

Detective's Handbook fig. 14 (c): Forensic Analysis—a Demonstration on Dust


1. EXTRACT SAMPLES FROM THE SCENE


2. ANALYZE 'EM, THEN PORE OVER THE RESULTS


3. MIX UP A REVELATORY COCKTAIL


4. FIND THE HIDDEN TRACES LEFT BEHIND


Please note: this game is currently under development, and screenshots reflect a work in progress. Artwork displayed is not final.

data.short_description: Mistmoon Falls is an open world murder mystery set in a farm-sim town that's now sans farmer. Question the locals, use tools to uncover clues, and sift through some sinister goings-on to find the killer. Choices matter, and who to arrest is up to you—all you need is proof.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains references to criminal violence and a potentially unsettling mood.
